heading: Today
text: Valley fog burning off to sunshine, mixing with some high clouds in the afternoon.  Highs in the low to mid 60s, closer to 60 over the higher terrain.  Winds light and variable.

heading: Tonight
text: Mainly clear skies, mixed with patches of high clouds.  Areas of river valley fog.  Lows in the 30s to near 40, some upper 20s in the cold spots north, with areas of frost.  Winds light and variable, becoming southerly near 10 mph in the Champlain Valley after midnight.

heading: Friday
text: Valley fog burning off to sunshine.  Highs in the 60s to around 70.  Winds becoming south up to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph through the Champlain Valley.
